title: Key West Food and Wine Festival
seo_title: Enjoy Key West Food and Wine Festival While Staying At The Marker Waterfront Resort
seo_description: One event that you don't want to miss while you are in Key West! The annual Key West Food and Wine Festival has been recognized by the Travel Channel, and the examiner.com listed it as one of the top 5 food and wine events that you must attend in 2017. Don't forget to book your stay at The Marker Waterfront Resort while you're in town for these special tastings and culinary adventure.
short_description: Enjoy Key West Food and Wine Festival While Staying At The Marker Waterfront Resort
contents: One event that you don't want to miss while you are in Key West! The annual Key West Food and Wine Festival has been recognized by the Travel Channel, and the examiner.com listed it as one of the top 5 food and wine events that you must attend in 2017. Don't forget to book your stay at The Marker Waterfront Resort while you're in town for these special tastings and culinary adventure. Book now!
